Query Census 2020 State Codes

Source: R/query_state_codes.R
query_state_codes.Rd

Query the 2020 state codes from the US Census Bureau

Usage

query_state_codes()

Value

a data frame of 2020 state codes

Examples

query_state_codes()
#>    STATE STATEFP STATENS                                   STATE_NAME
#> 1     AL      01 1779775                                      Alabama
#> 2     AK      02 1785533                                       Alaska
#> 3     AZ      04 1779777                                      Arizona
#> 4     AR      05   68085                                     Arkansas
